name: Bag Packer
description:
Bag Packer is a arcade-style casual game grocery bag packing game designed for phones but brought to you in Web form.

In Bag Packer you grab items off the conveyor belt and stuff them into paper bags. When the bag is full, you get points and can move onto the next bag. The tasks isn't that simple though -- items can get crushed under each others' weight, losng you points. Additionally, items that never get picked up from the belt spoil and cause negative points. 

You have 5 minutes. Can you survive?

___

Bag Packer features code by me, Oski, and art by my girlfriend, Erika. This is Erika's first time being involved in game dev. We had fun developing this game, even though we didn't commit too much time to it.
